title: A simple and rapid HPLC-UV method for the determination of valproic acid in human plasma using microwave-assisted derivatization with phenylhydrazine hydrochloride
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Sirikanya Kaewpradit, Gorawit Yusakul, Pornchai Rojsitthisak, Chutima Jantarat
